src:
В Крыму хотят еще один мост – Крым за неделю с Александром Янковским

02 Nov 2019, 05:35

Почему российские деньги не могут помочь крымскому селу? Куда делись десятки компаний, которые подрядились строить на полуострове школы, детские сады и дороги? На Южном берегу Крыма хотят запретить строительства новых жилых домов. И как чиновники собираются заманивать российских туристов в Крым зимой?
Ответы на эти и другие вопросы вы услышите в программе «Крым за неделю с Александром Янковским». Начало эфира в Крыму – 7:40.
Программу можно слушать в Крыму на Радио Крым.Реалии (105.9 FM), а также на сайте Крым.Реалии.
text:
Naev: During the shelling of the APU may return to position
02 Nov 2019, 05:04 by Correspondent.net
The Ukrainian military has the opportunity to observe the action of the enemy in the breeding areas.
Deputy Chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Sergey Nayev notes that in case the enemy resumes shelling in the areas of separation of forces in the Donbass, the Armed Forces have the right to regain their positions, which is provided for by the Tripartite Contact Group in Minsk on a framework agreement on the separation of forces.
There is a framework agreement signed on September 21, 2016 by the Tripartite Contact Group, and three breeding sites are registered in it: Stanitsa Luganskaya, Zolotoye and Petrovskoye. If the shelling resumes later, it is stipulated that the parties have the right to take these positions. A separation of the parties was already taking place in Zolotoy and Petrovsky, but then these sections were occupied due to the fact that the enemy violated the conditions, "he said on the television channel Ukraine.
Nayev noted that the Ukrainian military has the opportunity to observe the enemy’s actions in the breeding areas. "We have provided for the creation of an appropriate intelligence system. Including using video so that you can see it. There are such systems, and the Ukrainian army has the ability to observe the actions of the enemy," he said.
Earlier, Nayev said that a large number of militants in the Donbass in the zone of the separation of forces and means are not observed.
